title.rendered: Signature Global City 37D: Low Rise Premium Independent Floors Gurugram

content.rendered:
Welcome to the enthrallingrealm of premium floors in Gurugram, that comes with contemporary amenities and futuristic approach. This is Signature Global City 37D Gurugram, a premium residential project that comes with all the classic features that defines today’s lifestyle.Planned to cater the needs of the present-day dwellers, these premium floors in Gurugram have been structured under the Deen Dayal Jan Awaas Yojna (DDJAY) scheme of the Haryana Government. The project’s architectural set-up has been worked on by the renowned Padma Bhushan Architect Hafeez Contractor. The aesthetics of the project certainly proves to be an advantage.


With the grand success of the first phase of Signature Global City 37D we have recently launched the second phase. There are a total of 336 units that the project is currently offering. The total land parcel that the second phase covers is 5.62 acres. Both the phases are Edge Certified clubbed with Green Home features. This means that the construction of the project is free from toxic materials and is environment-friendly. Green Homes not only gives you a sustainable life but also helps you to breathe in a surrounding that has better indoor air-quality. Usage of renewable resources can be seen in this luxury apartments in Dwarka Expressway. Let’s check few features of Green Homes that the project has.


Key Features of Green Homes

  • Energy-efficient Walls
  • Natural Ventilation
  • Operational Energy Saving Features
  • Optimum Window-to-wall Ratio (WWR)
  • Reflective Roof
  • High Thermal Performance Windows
  • Water Saving Features
  • Low Flow Water Closet
  • Low Flow Water Fixtures (taps, showerheads)
  • Rainwater Harvesting
  • Waste Water Treatment & Reuse
  • Embodied Energy Saving Features
  • Low Embodied Energy Materials (walls, floor & roof slab, flooring & window frames) and many more such features

Location Advantage

Relish and experience a good lifestyle spread across 20.5890 acres of happiness and well-connected life with proximity to key highways. This project is bang on the upcoming Dwarka Expressway. Pataudi Road is also in close proximity from this Signature Global’s exclusive project. The connecting road further joins the National Highway 8 (NH 8) via Hero Honda Chowk. The Golf Course Extension Road is also within eased reach from the Signature Global City 37D Gurugram. Huda City Center metro station is the nearest metro from the project. Other major landmarks of Gurugram along with the IMT Manesarand IGI airport are also well-connected.


Connectivity

  • Hero Honda Chowk
  • Dwarka Expressway
  • KherkiDaula Toll, NH-8
  • Indira Gandhi International Airport
  • IMT Manesar

Schools

  • Alpine Convent School
  • Blue Bells Public School
  • Dream School
  • CHSP Public School

Hospitals

  • ShriBalaji Hospital & Trauma Center
  • Signature Hospital
  • Yadav Hospital
  • Aarvy Hospital

Hotels

  • Hyatt Regency
  • ITC Grand Bharat
  • Holiday Inn

When we talk about the facilities &features, the project has it all. The modern amenities that the developer proudly offers to its dwellers are exceptionally amazing. Spacious rooms, stilt+ 4 Floors structure, dedicated lift, green space on terrace, private service area and much more are available at Signature Global City 37D Gurugram. Modular kitchens, fully air-conditioned premium floors, air-conditioned home office with waiting lobby are also available in these premium floors in Gurugram . These amenities will act as perfect support system for the dwellers who wish to live life to the fullest. 


Enlisted are these interestingly strategized amenities.

  • Outdoor Gym
  • Dedicated Car Parking
  • Yoga Lawn& Meditation Lawn
  • Jogging Track
  • Butterfly Garden
  • Open-airAmphitheatre
  • Skating Rink
  • Swimming Pool
  • Clubhouse
  • Yoga & Meditation Lawn
  • Pet’s Area
  • Cricket Net / Box Cricket
  • Toddlers’ Play Area
  • Outdoor Gym
  • Multipurpose Lawn
  • Badminton Court
  • Half Basketball Court
  • Senior Citizen Area
  • Kid’s Pool
  • Jacuzzi
  • Pool Deck with Cabanna
  • Kid’s Play Area
  • Reflexology Path / Garden
  • Tree House
  • Nature Exploration Area
  • Forest Camping Area

The construction quality is superb. Life at Signature Global City 37D Gurugram is full of fun & frolic environment where kids can play & learn while the elderly can sit & enjoy the surrounding. With the availability of 2 & 3 BHK flats in Gurugram , the project initiates an elite-style living for the home seekers & investors round the region. Additionally, Vastu-compliant prayer rooms have also been added in the units that will help to harness positive energy and create an atmosphere of ecstasy in the house.Furthermore, residents of the society can spend their free time in the community clubs that feature exciting games and a fully-equipped gym. Outstanding amenities with complete security are also provided to make your life more comfortable and hassle-free.
